episode_event_general_ch0092_80_iris/670:
Oh, there you are! You’ve gotta hear about the
super-amazing event happening right now,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Indeed! As you know, Pasio is host to Champions
from all over the world.

To celebrate this monumental gathering, there’s
going to be an event called the Festival of
Champions right here on the island!

I’ve already signed up to participate as the
Champion of Unova!
I can’t wait to put on a show for all of the fans!

You’ll come and watch, won’t you? I hope to
see you there!
episode_event_general_ch0092_80_iris/680:
I can’t wait to chat with everyone! I’m gonna
make sure this the funnest festival ever!

And I’ll be the brightest Champion in the bunch!
Just you wait—the crowds will be so hyped up,
they won’t know what to do with themselves!
